About

Junyu JIANG

This is Junyu JIANG's personal homepage. Originally from Chengdu, I graduated from the Communication University of China in 2025 with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Communication Studies. After graduation, I went to San Diego, California to pursue a Master's degree in Computational Social Science.



please refer to my Curriculum Vitae.



This is my little corner where I document my writings. I’ll be sharing my thoughts and experiences here, and I hope you find them helpful or interesting.



Email me at:juj013@ucsd.edu
